title: "dippy the most beautiful thing" sans serif
author: jonathanlawley

comments.content: [It's similar](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123943/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/microsoft/trebuchet/ms/testdrive.html?s=be%a0beautiful...%a0God%2C%a0does%a0that&p=36) but I don't think so, Mike. Not that I know what it is...

You're right. I tried shooting from the hip. My Bad.   
   
When I looked in the [Sans Serif Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123943/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/SansIDPage09.html) I found it was FF Info Text (near the bottom of the page)

Never mind! The 'y' isn't right and neither is the 'c'. I have a sample that shows the curved 'l', but the FontShop site shows a straight 'l'. I give up (for now).   
   
I think you fast guys are making me rush. Slo-o-o-w down Mike...
Don't have time to check, but might it be something from G-Type?

If you mean [Nubian](http://web.archive.org/web/20050518123943/http:/www.fontworks2.type.co.uk/fw/shop/catalog?action=zoom&rt=011956002&x=0&y=0&s=sf%3A*%3Bqa%3Anubian%3Bf%3A*%3Bp%3A0%3Bq%3AquickSearch%3B), that's not it either.
